samples.name: Subsection with Expand/Collapse
samples.description: This example shows subsections in expanded and collapsed mode.

samples.name: Subsection with blocks using column layout
samples.description: This example shows how the size of the blocks and be either specified or automatic

samples.name: Subsection with automatic layout of blocks
samples.description: This example shows how blocks can be laid out automatically by the Object Page when their size is not specified.

samples.name: Subsection with Action buttons sample
samples.description: Example of a subsection displaying action buttons.

samples.name: Object Page Layout Section sample
samples.description: This example explains the rules for the rendering of sections

samples.name: Object Page with Title on top
samples.description: Object Page sample showing a layout with subsection titles on top. This is the default layout. The sample also shows the 'Edit header' button in the Header Content area.

samples.name: Object Page using the Tab navigation mode
samples.description: Object Page sample showing a layout where the navigation is Tab based (one Tab per section) rather than having all of the sections visible at the same time.

samples.name: Object Page State
samples.description: This example shows how the page can be accessed directly to a specific vertical position, with "See More" enabled

samples.name: Object Page with Title on the left
samples.description: Object Page sample showing a layout with subsection titles on the left.

samples.name: Object Page with LazyLoading
samples.description: Object Page with LazyLoading

samples.name: Object Page with LazyLoading without blocks
samples.description: This sample showcases the lazy loading using the stashed property of the ObjectPageLazyLoader. It enables usage of lazy loading without the need to have Blocks

samples.name: Single View sample
samples.description: Use of implicit static view definition.

samples.name: ObjectPage Blockbase
samples.description: This example shows the different layout of the blocks based on their ColumnLayout.

samples.name: Model Mapping
samples.description: Use of dynamic model mapping

samples.name: Bound Model Mapping
samples.description: Use of dynamic bound model mapping

samples.name: Mode Awareness
samples.description: A block that use the same view for several modes and a controller that implements onParentBlockModeChange

samples.name: Block in a block
samples.description: Uses a block in a view of another block

samples.name: Mixed block
samples.description: Uses a block in a view of another block

samples.name: Eventing blocks
samples.description: Uses of a block that is firing a dummy event

samples.name: ObjectPageHeader with all controls
samples.description: This is an example of an ObjectPageHeader containing all possible controls in it.

samples.name: Object Page AnchorBar
samples.description: AnchorBar has a different behavior based on the device

samples.name: Object Page AnchorBar with numbers
samples.description: This example shows how to visualize numbers in parenthesis after the corresponding section titles in the AnchorBar

samples.name: Navigation to Section sample
samples.description: This example shows how to change the default behavior in order to be able to navigate to sections instead of subsections, using the Anchor Bar

samples.name: ObjectPageHeader with placeholder
samples.description: This is an example of ObjectPageHeader using the showPlaceholder property.

samples.name: ObjectPageHeader options
samples.description: This is a different example of ObjectPageHeader hiding the headerTitle area entirely until user scrolls down.

samples.name: Standard Fiori ObjectPageHeader
samples.description: This is an example of an ObjectPageHeader containing mainly KPIs.

samples.name: ObjectPageHeaderContent
samples.description: This is an example of an ObjectPageHeaderContent.

samples.name: ObjectPage as a child page
samples.description: This is an example of an ObjectPage Child page.

samples.name: ObjectPage with HeaderContent always shown on desktop
samples.description: This is an example of an ObjectPage with property alwaysShowContentHeader set to true. In this case the HeaderContent won't snap on a desktop.

samples.name: Object Page Header Content Priorities
samples.description: The sample shows how to set priorities of the ObjectPageHeader content items by using the ObjectPageHeaderContentLayoutData element

samples.name: ObjectPage with forms
samples.description: Object Page automatically adjusts form layout to match block column layout

samples.name: ObjectPage with DynamicSideContent Button
samples.description: The sample shows Object Page inside a main content of DynamicSideContent. The ObjectPageHeader has property DynamicSideContentButton set to true which is used to show the side panel of DynamicSideContent.
